abstract: Columbus Alternative High School students visiting Donald Trump rally in Ohio for extra credit in history class experience firsthand vitriol that often attends candidate's events as they fall into anti-Trump chant and are kicked out.
lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump’s heated language on surveillance of Muslims, immigration and Syrian refugees is firing up his crowds and at times resulting in physical clashes between supporters and protesters.

headline.main: At Donald Trump Rally, Ohio Students Become Part of a Lesson
headline.print_headline: Students at Trump Rally Become Part of a Venomous Political Lesson

snippet: Donald J. Trump’s heated language on surveillance of Muslims, immigration and Syrian refugees is firing up his crowds and at times resulting in physical clashes between supporters and protesters.
